title: Flooding soil with biogas slurry suppresses root-knot nematodes and alters soil nematode communities
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Yufei Li, Bensheng Liu, Jijin Li, Guoyuan Zou, Junxiang Xu, Lianfeng Du, Qianqian Lang, Xiang Zhao, Qinping Sun
